column5: WENT OUT TODAY TO A DIFFERENT SPOT( A LITTLE FAIRY DROPPED ME A HINT LOL) AND DID WELL!!!  LANDED 14 FOR 23 BETWEEN THE 2 OF US!!!  CAM WAS FINIKY AGAIN TODAY!!! WORKED  ONLY WHEN IT WANTED TOO  LOL  ALL CHROME FISH SO A FRESH BATCH MOVED IN!!! THIS WEEKEND THE RIVERS ARE GONNA BLOW SO BEWARE!!! GONNA BE 4 OR 5 DAYS TILL THEY CLEAR UP!!       BAD PIC BUT JUST WANTED TO SHOW YA THE CHROME!!!
Cant wait to get out this weekend down here. There should be some spotty oppurtunities this weekend if i cant get out tomorrow
Copper 14 for 23 is great river fishing bro. Keep it up. Cheers AL

I think about this time last year..........I mentioned something along the lines of:  I HATE YOU!!  I still have a month at least for the opportunity, if we have any runoff to speak of. If we don't, I will probably not even bother them, I will just let them be.  Ahh........I digress, great stuff Scott, thanks for posting that.
well done .  ..again as usual...lol  wtg,you sure you know how to bag&tag them....just a question???? did you leave any for us......cheers
Wow Scott!!!  2 days in a row...hope you saved some for tomorrow morning!!! LOL.  Looking forward to your report with LOTS of pics!
WTG Scott ... I went 0/0 on lake Joe today ... shoulda headed east I guess
